casebody.data:
Lake Garda Company, Incorporated v. George LeWitt.

Maltbie, C. J., Avery, Brown, Jennings and Ells, Js.

*589Argued April 3 decided May 1, 1940. *597M. J. Blumenfeld, with whom, on the brief, was DeLancey Pelgrift, for the appellant (defendant). Samuel Rosenthal, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

For the reasons stated in the memorandum of decision quoted above, we find correct the conclusion reached, that Cumulative Supplement 1939, § 1364e, repealed by implication the right of appeal provided by statute, Special Acts, 1917, page 1119, from the City Court of New Britain.

There is no error.
